entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
